name: Wisdom of Agamaggan
tooltip:
Wisdom of Agamaggan

The shaman and geomancers of the quilboar tribes <snort> call upon the strength of Agamaggan to help them in battle and in their rituals, <race>.

If you too wish the added power of Agamaggan's blessing with your spells, then bring me 4 blood shards and Mangletooth will aid you.

Requirements:
- Blood Shard x 4
